bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVII (Nos 2801-2823)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXVII (Nos 2801-2823). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 53.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1971, 8°, xii-111 pp. et XI pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 267-268. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 40 (1971) p. 494. - Jean Irigoin, REG 85 (1972) pp. 232-234. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 45 (1973) pp. 321-330. - Paul Mertens, BibO 29 (1972) pp. 192-193. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 49 (1969) pp. 280-281. - Roger A. Pack, AJP 95 (1974) pp. 186-187. - Juan Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) p. 51. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 91, pp. 187-190. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 21 (1970) p. 337. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 90 (1973) pp. 372-381 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. XXXVI et XXXVIII).
